content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, your virtual assistant. How can I assist you with your plumbing needs today? May I please have your name to get started?
Actually, I changed my mind. I don't need a plumber anymore. Sorry.
No problem at all! If you ever need plumbing, electrical, or HVAC help in the future, please feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
